text:
My insipiration to do what I am actually studying it was perfume publicity on bus stop.
I was thinking about my life but when I saw the publicity's poster, I was like "waw I love this  !", and I've said to myself "you can also make people say waw on your job" . So I looked how to make theses posters and then I saw that in Information-Communication we can after the licence and the master.
I like the fact of hilighlighting a product, more particularly a perfume because there is a universe which is totally open to advertising it. It can be sensual, romantic, science fiction's universe... We can create a lot of story to sell it. We can also play with colors, clothes of the mannequin, the light.  There is a lot of possibilities. I like the concept to sell something to people by attracting them. We need to seduce the public, exactly like when i was amaze by the pub on my stop bus (it was a publicity for DIOR, J'adore Dior).
We can also seduce people with slogan, promote the brand with our imagination it's something that matters a lot.
 This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here.
